front.title: •Trooper Jerrol Blendin
front.gametext: Deploys only on Cloud City, but may move elsewhere. Power +2 when participating in a battle you initiate. Opponent may use 2 Force to 'bribe' (exclude) Blendin from battle.
front.lore: Corrupt captain of the Cloud City Wing Guard. Began working during the administration of Baron Raynor. Easily bribed. Keeps the peace through intimidation.

combo: Blendin + Trooper Assault + Trooper Charge : Power *8* if you initiate the battle, all at the cost of zero Force! Makes a great surprise for your opponent in a 'react' deck.  Blendin + Lone Warrior : Leave him alone at a site and give him defensive cards. Then, if your opponent chooses not to let him participate in a battle, the battle is just cancelled.
